title: How much baking soda and baking powder should be added for 1 cup of flour in an eggless cake? - Quora

response.answer_text: Add 1 tsp of baking powder for 1 cup of flour. Don’t add more than that. Addition of baking soda depends on whether or not you’ll be adding any acidic element (like lemon juice, vinegar, orange juice) to your cake batter. If yes, then add 1/4 tsp of it else no need in my opinion. Best of luck! :)
